unit.data.steward.name: Nature Steward
unit.data.steward.lore: Stewards offering support to the Nature Warden, they have been created by the Gods of Nature to protect the land against the invaders from other planes.
unit.data.steward.description.visuals: Small bipedal wooden creature. Wearing a large pack of tree leaves as hair. Carrying a wodden curled up walking stick. Small round wodden eyes.His body covered with tree lines like tatoos.
